name: Don't Die While Delivering
description:
Don't Die While Delivering

Made in less than 3 days for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2 !

Do everthing you always dreamed of! Just dont die while delivering! 

This is and will be a experimental comedy game that i will develop with some friends along this year! 

What you can download here is the jam version only with the basic gameplay and 1 level.

I already created characters, writing dialog and delineated the plot line, but because the time was short i prefered to not implement any story and just get your feed back on the mechanics and the ms paint aesthetic!

This is just for fun, please dont think is gonna be good :3

NEXT PLANNED UPDATE:

4K REMASTERIZATION
